name: ioc-registry
description: A registry which allows a module implementation and objects to be registered against a logical name to provide an IOC mechanism.

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:saucelabs: envcheck SAUCE_USERNAME && envcheck SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY && karma start karma-saucelabs.conf.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run browserify && npm run browserify:standalone
scripts.browserify:standalone: mkdirp dist && browserify index.js -o dist/ioc-registry_umd.js --standalone ioc_registry

author: Andy Berry <http://andy-berry.co.uk>
